notes: feminine noun; can mean 'mail', 'post office', or 'stake'
example_sentence_english: I check the mail every morning.

notes: used for a single item of mail or occasionally 'a stake'
example_sentence_english: I received an important piece of mail.

notes: plural form; often refers to the postal service
example_sentence_italian: Le poste sono numerose in centro.
example_sentence_english: There are many post offices downtown.
The post offices are closed today.

notes: partitive plural; contraction of di + le
example_sentence_english: I visited some historic post offices.

example_sentence_italian: L'orario della posta è sul sito.
example_sentence_english: The post office hours are on the website.
I am going to the post office after lunch.
Tomorrow we are going to the post offices.
I am leaving the post office now.
I pick up the mail from the post offices.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato il documento nella posta.
example_sentence_english: I found the document in the mail.
We meet at the post offices tomorrow.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto una notizia sulla posta.
example_sentence_english: I read a news item about the mail.

translation_english: on the post offices/about the post offices
example_sentence_italian: Ci sono file sulle poste oggi.
example_sentence_english: There are queues at the post offices today.

example_sentence_italian: Ho inviato il pacco con la posta.
example_sentence_english: I sent the package by mail.
We work with the local post offices.
